protocol.name: P-GSE31837-1
protocol.text: ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA signal normalized with poly(A) control

protocol.name: P-GSE31837-2
protocol.text: Cells at seven days after subculturing were used as control cells. Cold treated cells were then exposed to cold stress by transferring into a growth chamber at 4°C under dim lights (40 umolm-2s-1) for 24 hours.

protocol.name: P-GSE31837-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis T87 suspension cells derived from Col-0 ecotype were grown in JPL media (Axelos et al.,Plant Physiol. Biochem. 30, p123-128, 1992) at 22°C under constant light (80 umolm-2s-1) with orbital shaking (120 rpm).

protocol.name: P-GSE31837-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from the cells by using RNeasy Plant Mini kit (Qiagen), and purified and concentrated with RNeasy MinElute Cleanup kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE31837-5
protocol.text: All procedures were carried out following the Affymetrix GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual.

protocol.name: P-GSE31837-6
protocol.text: All procedures were carried out following the Affymetrix GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual.

protocol.name: P-GSE31837-7
protocol.text: All procedures were carried out following the Affymetrix GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual.

protocol.name: P-GSE31837-8
protocol.text: Data were analyzed by Bioconductor of R. To extract the expression level of the probe set, the Robust Multichip Average (RMA) method implemented in the Affy package was used. Log-transformed RMA value was delogged and then normalized with the average expression level of poly(A) RNA controls derived from Bacillus subtilis genes.
